title: Understanding the Relationship Between Addiction and Learning: Relational Approaches and Societal Implications

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Focuses on analyzing workplace addiction issues and learning barriers, seeking relational perspectives for solutions

learning_goals: Learners can explain addiction phenomena from the perspective of interactions between individuals and environments
Learners can present the impact of addiction on learning processes through case analysis
Learners can propose at least three relationship improvement strategies for resolving workplace addiction issues

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
